meals.name: Greek Yogurt Power Bowl
meals.instructions: Add Greek yogurt to a bowl. Top with rolled oats, mixed berries, chia seeds, and walnuts. Drizzle with honey.

meals.name: Masala Dosa
meals.instructions: Ferment rice and urad dal batter. Make potato filling with spices. Spread batter on hot griddle and add filling. Fold and serve with chutney.

meals.name: Rava Upma
meals.instructions: Roast semolina lightly. Temper mustard seeds and urad dal in ghee, add vegetables, then semolina. Add water, mix well, and cook until absorbed.

meals.name: Pongal
meals.instructions: Cook rice and moong dal together. Temper with cumin, pepper, ginger, and curry leaves in ghee. Mix well and garnish with cashews.

meals.name: Medu Vada
meals.instructions: Soak and grind urad dal to a fluffy batter. Add spices and herbs. Shape into doughnuts and deep fry until golden brown. Serve with coconut chutney and sambar.

meals.name: Uttapam
meals.instructions: Ferment rice and urad dal batter. Pour on hot griddle, top with chopped vegetables, drizzle oil, and cook until golden. Serve with chutney.

meals.name: Appam
meals.instructions: Soak rice, grind with coconut and cooked rice. Ferment overnight. Cook in an appam pan to get lacy edges and soft center. Serve with vegetable stew.

meals.name: Puttu
meals.instructions: Sprinkle water on rice flour and mix to crumbly texture. Layer with grated coconut in puttu maker. Steam until cooked. Serve with banana or kadala curry.

meals.name: Pesarattu
meals.instructions: Soak moong dal and rice. Grind with spices. Make thin dosas on hot griddle. Serve with ginger chutney or upma.

meals.name: Kambu Dosai
meals.instructions: Ferment kambu and urad batter, make dosas on hot tawa.

meals.name: Ragi Kali
meals.instructions: Cook ragi flour in boiling water, stir till thick and form into balls.

meals.name: Spinach and Mushroom Omelette
meals.instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan. Sauté mushrooms until golden. Add spinach until wilted. Beat eggs with salt and pepper, then pour over vegetables. Cook until set, top with crumbled feta.

meals.name: Idli with Sambar
meals.instructions: Steam the idlis and serve hot with sambar.

meals.name: Poha
meals.instructions: Sauté mustard seeds, onions, peanuts. Add rinsed poha and cook.

meals.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
meals.instructions: Layer yogurt, berries, and granola in a glass. Serve chilled.

meals.name: Oatmeal with Fruits
meals.instructions: Cook oats in milk. Top with sliced banana and drizzle honey.

meals.name: Rajma Chawal
meals.instructions: Cook rajma with onion-tomato masala. Serve hot with rice.

meals.name: Vegetable Biryani
meals.instructions: Cook rice and vegetables with biryani masala and yogurt.

meals.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
meals.instructions: Grill the chicken and slice. Toss greens and tomatoes with olive oil, top with chicken.

meals.name: Chettinad Chicken Curry with Appam
meals.instructions: Marinate chicken with spices. Sauté onions, add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, and marinated chicken. Add coconut milk and simmer. Serve with freshly made appams.

meals.name: Sambar Rice (Sambar Saadham)
meals.instructions: Cook rice and toor dal separately. Prepare sambar with vegetables and tamarind. Mix cooked rice and sambar. Season with mustard seeds and curry leaves tempered in oil.

meals.name: Avial with Kerala Rice
meals.instructions: Cook vegetables with turmeric. Grind coconut, green chilies, and cumin to a paste. Mix with vegetables. Add beaten yogurt and curry leaves. Drizzle coconut oil on top. Serve with Kerala rice.

meals.name: Pav Bhaji
meals.instructions: Boil vegetables and potatoes. Mash them. Sauté onions, add tomatoes and spices. Mix with mashed vegetables. Toast pav buns with butter. Serve bhaji with pav, topped with butter and coriander.

meals.name: Bisi Bele Bath
meals.instructions: Cook rice and dal together. Sauté vegetables, add tamarind, jaggery, and spice powder. Mix with rice-dal mixture. Temper with ghee, cashews, and curry leaves.

meals.name: Paneer Butter Masala with Naan
meals.instructions: Make tomato-onion-cashew gravy. Add butter, spices, and cream. Add paneer cubes and simmer. Garnish with kasuri methi. Serve hot with butter naan.

meals.name: Lemon Rice (Elumichai Saadham)
meals.instructions: Cook rice and let it cool. Temper mustard seeds, add peanuts, chilies, and curry leaves. Add turmeric and mix with rice. Add lemon juice and salt. Mix well.

meals.name: Quinoa Bowl with Roasted Vegetables
meals.instructions: Cook quinoa. Roast vegetables with olive oil. Mix quinoa and vegetables. Add lemon juice and herbs. Top with feta cheese and mixed seeds.

meals.name: Tamarind Rice (Puliyogare)
meals.instructions: Cook rice and let it cool. Prepare tamarind extract with jaggery and spices. Temper mustard seeds, add dals, peanuts, and curry leaves. Mix with rice and tamarind extract.

meals.name: Malabar Fish Curry with Steamed Rice
meals.instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt. Prepare gravy with tomatoes, tamarind, and coconut milk. Add spices and fish pieces. Simmer until cooked. Serve with steamed rice.

meals.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
meals.instructions: Stir-fry vegetables, add rice and soy sauce. Cook for 5 minutes.

meals.name: Grilled Chicken and Quinoa Salad
meals.instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Grill chicken breast with salt and pepper. Combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and avocado in a bowl. Add cooked quinoa and sliced grilled chicken. Dress with olive oil and lemon juice.

meals.name: Keerai Sadam
meals.instructions: Cook spinach with garlic and mix with hot rice, season with ghee.

meals.name: Paruppu Rasam
meals.instructions: Boil dal, tomato, tamarind with rasam powder, season with mustard and curry leaves.

meals.name: Mediterranean Lentil Bowl
meals.instructions: Combine lentils, chopped tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion in a bowl. Add crumbled feta and olives. Dress with olive oil, lemon juice, chopped herbs, salt, and pepper. Mix well.

meals.name: Chapati with Dal Tadka
meals.instructions: Make chapatis from flour dough. Serve with ghee-topped dal tadka.

meals.name: Rasam with Steamed Rice
meals.instructions: Cook toor dal. Boil tamarind water with tomatoes. Add rasam powder and cooked dal. Temper with mustard, cumin, garlic and curry leaves in ghee. Serve with steamed rice.

meals.name: Coconut Vegetable Stew with Appam
meals.instructions: Sauté spices in coconut oil. Add vegetables and sauté. Pour coconut milk and simmer. Season with salt and pepper. Prepare appams with fermented rice flour and coconut batter. Serve stew with appams.

meals.name: Curd Rice (Thayir Sadam)
meals.instructions: Cook rice and mash slightly. Mix with yogurt and milk. Temper mustard seeds, green chilies, ginger and curry leaves in oil. Add to rice. Garnish with pomegranate seeds and coriander.

meals.name: Kadala Curry with Puttu
meals.instructions: Pressure cook chickpeas. Sauté onions, ginger-garlic, tomatoes, and spices. Add chickpeas and water. Simmer. Meanwhile, prepare puttu by steaming rice flour and coconut in a puttu maker. Serve curry with puttu.

meals.name: Paruppu Urundai Kuzhambu (Lentil Ball Curry)
meals.instructions: Cook dal partially. Mix with spices and coconut, form balls. Prepare tamarind gravy with onions, tomatoes, and spices. Add lentil balls and simmer. Serve with steamed rice.

meals.name: Kozhi Varutha Curry (Chicken Fry Curry) with Parotta
meals.instructions: Marinate chicken with spices. Sauté onions, ginger-garlic paste, and tomatoes. Add chicken and cook until done. Meanwhile, prepare layered parottas. Cook on a hot griddle. Serve curry with parottas.

meals.name: Mysore Masala Dosa
meals.instructions: Ferment rice and dal batter. Make red chili garlic paste. Prepare potato filling. Spread batter on hot griddle, apply red paste, add potato filling, fold and serve with coconut chutney and sambar.

meals.name: Kathirikai Poriyal (Eggplant Stir-fry) with Rice
meals.instructions: Dice eggplant. Temper mustard seeds, add onions, green chilies, and curry leaves. Add eggplant, spices, and cook until tender. Serve with steamed rice and papad.

meals.name: Poricha Kootu with Rice
meals.instructions: Cook dal and vegetables with turmeric. Grind coconut, chilies, and cumin to a paste. Mix with cooked vegetables and dal. Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves in ghee. Serve with rice.

meals.name: Meen Pollichathu (Fish in Banana Leaf) with Matta Rice
meals.instructions: Marinate fish with spices. Sauté onions, ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, and green chilies. Mix with fish. Wrap in banana leaves and grill. Serve with red matta rice.

meals.name: Paneer Butter Masala with Jeera Rice
meals.instructions: Cook paneer in buttery tomato gravy. Serve with jeera-flavored rice.

meals.name: Idiyappam with Coconut Milk
meals.instructions: Serve soft idiyappam with fresh coconut milk sweetened lightly.

meals.name: Paniyaram
meals.instructions: Pour batter in paniyaram pan and cook till golden brown on both sides.

meals.name: Baked Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
meals.instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C. Cut sweet potato, broccoli, and bell pepper into chunks. Toss vegetables with olive oil, minced garlic, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes. Season salmon with salt, pepper, and herbs. Place salmon on a separate baking sheet, squeeze lemon juice over it, and bake for 12-15 minutes until cooked through.

meals.name: Baked Salmon with Vegetables
meals.instructions: Bake salmon and vegetables at 180°C for 20 minutes.

meals.name: Paneer Tikka Wrap
meals.instructions: Grill paneer with capsicum and onion, wrap in roti.

meals.name: Turkey Chili with Brown Rice
meals.instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions. In a pot, heat olive oil and sauté chopped onion, bell pepper, and garlic until soft. Add ground turkey and cook until browned. Add chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper. Stir in diced tomatoes and kidney beans. Simmer for 20 minutes. Serve chili over brown rice.

meals.name: Sundal
meals.instructions: Mix boiled chickpeas with grated coconut and season with mustard seeds.

meals.name: Quinoa Idli Bites
meals.instructions: Soak rice, quinoa, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds. Grind to a batter and ferment. Mix in vegetables and chia seeds. Steam in mini muffin trays for bite-sized idlis. Serve with avocado chutney.

meals.name: Baked Masala Vadai Crisps
meals.instructions: Soak dals, grind coarsely with minimal water. Mix with finely chopped vegetables and spices. Spread thinly on a baking sheet. Brush with olive oil. Bake at 375°F until crisp. Break into pieces for a healthy snack.

meals.name: Air-Fried Banana Blossom Vada
meals.instructions: Boil and squeeze out water from banana blossom. Mix with chickpea flour, ground oats, and chopped vegetables. Form into patties. Spray with olive oil and air-fry at 350°F for 15 minutes, turning once.

meals.name: Ragi Masala Cookies
meals.instructions: Mix flours, herbs, spices, and flaxseed. Add chopped onion and olive oil. Add water to form a stiff dough. Roll out and cut into rounds. Bake at 350°F for 15 minutes until crisp.

meals.name: Greek Yogurt Mysore Pak
meals.instructions: Roast chickpea flour. Heat ghee and coconut sugar to make syrup. Mix in roasted flour, Greek yogurt, and cardamom. Pour into a greased tray. Sprinkle pistachios. Cut when set but still warm.

meals.name: Cauliflower Bonda Bites with Pesto Dip
meals.instructions: Mix grated cauliflower, flours, and spices. Form into small balls. Shallow fry in olive oil. For pesto, blend basil, pine nuts, oil, and salt. Serve bondas with pesto dip.

meals.name: Millet Murukku Twists
meals.instructions: Mix flours, seeds, and spices. Add hot butter and water to form dough. Use murukku press to make twists. Air-fry at 350°F for 12 minutes or shallow fry in oil.

meals.name: Beetroot Thattai Crisps
meals.instructions: Mix rice flour with beetroot juice for color. Add roasted dals, spices, and seeds. Make firm dough. Roll out thinly. Cut into shapes. Bake at 375°F until crisp or shallow fry in oil.

meals.name: Coconut Ladoo Energy Balls
meals.instructions: Blend coconut, dates, and almonds in a food processor. Add chia seeds, cardamom, and vanilla. Form into balls. Roll in cacao nibs or extra coconut. Refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving.

meals.name: Spiced Jackfruit Chips
meals.instructions: Slice jackfruit thinly. Toss with spices and oil. Arrange on a baking sheet. Bake at 300°F for 30 minutes or until crispy, turning halfway. Alternative: dehydrate for 4-6 hours.

meals.name: Bonda
meals.instructions: Boil and mash potatoes. Temper mustard seeds and add onions, chilies, ginger, and curry leaves. Mix with potatoes. Make gram flour batter with spices. Dip potato balls in batter and deep fry until golden.

meals.name: Mysore Bonda (Goli Baje)
meals.instructions: Mix flour, yogurt, chopped onions, chilies, ginger, and curry leaves. Add baking soda. Let the batter rest for 30 minutes. Drop spoonfuls into hot oil and fry until golden brown.

meals.name: Nei Appam
meals.instructions: Melt jaggery in water and strain. Mix rice flour, mashed banana, cardamom, and coconut pieces with jaggery syrup. Make a thick batter. Heat appam pan, add ghee in each mold. Pour batter and cook until golden.

meals.name: Thattai
meals.instructions: Roast dals until golden. Mix rice flour with roasted dals, crushed red chilies, curry leaves, asafoetida, and sesame seeds. Add water to make firm dough. Flatten into small discs and deep fry until crisp.

meals.name: Kara Sev
meals.instructions: Mix gram flour, rice flour, and spices. Add water to make stiff dough. Fill in a chakli/sev press with a small hole disc. Press directly into hot oil and fry until crisp.

meals.name: Ribbon Pakoda
meals.instructions: Mix flours, butter, and spices. Add water to make stiff dough. Fill in a chakli press with a ribbon disc. Press into hot oil in a ribbon shape and fry until crisp.

meals.name: Kozhukattai (Sweet)
meals.instructions: Mix rice flour with hot water to make soft dough. Cook coconut and jaggery until thick. Add cardamom. Make small dough balls, flatten, add filling, and seal to form dumplings. Steam for 10-12 minutes.

meals.name: Thengai Bakshanam
meals.instructions: Mix grated coconut with crushed jaggery. Cook until jaggery melts. Add cardamom powder and rice flour. Cook until mixture thickens. Cool and form into small balls.

meals.name: Thenkuzhal
meals.instructions: Mix flours, butter, and spices. Add water to make stiff dough. Fill in a chakli/murukku press with a star disc. Press into hot oil in coil shape and fry until crisp.

meals.name: Achu Murukku (Rose Cookies)
meals.instructions: Mix flours, sugar, cardamom, and sesame seeds. Add coconut milk to make a flowing batter. Heat the achu murukku mold in oil. Dip in batter and then into hot oil. Fry until crisp.

meals.name: Paruppu Vadai
meals.instructions: Soak chana dal for 2 hours. Grind coarsely with minimal water. Mix with chopped onions, chilies, ginger, curry leaves, and fennel seeds. Shape into small patties and deep fry until golden.

meals.name: Murukku
meals.instructions: Prepare dough, shape with murukku press and deep fry until crisp.

meals.name: Masala Peanuts
meals.instructions: Coat peanuts with besan and spices. Deep fry until crispy.

meals.name: Sundal (Boiled Chickpeas)
meals.instructions: Temper mustard seeds, mix with boiled chickpeas and coconut.

meals.name: Apple with Almond Butter
meals.instructions: Slice the apple and serve with almond butter for dipping.

meals.name: Veggie Sticks with Hummus
meals.instructions: Arrange vegetable sticks on a plate and serve with hummus.

meals.name: Almonds and Raisins
meals.instructions: Mix almonds and raisins in a bowl.

meals.name: Peanut Butter Toast
meals.instructions: Spread peanut butter over toasted bread.

meals.name: Greek Yogurt with Honey
meals.instructions: Top Greek yogurt with honey and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
